author: bcurtis
msg: Remove deprecated addService() method.  The new way to register a plugin is to include it in res/xml/plugins.xml.

author: macdonst
msg: Issue #156: Camera.DestinationType.FILE_URI on Android not conforming to API Spec
Instead of capturing the orginal image to /sdcard/Pic.jpg or /sdcard/Capture.jpg we detect if the SD card is mounted. If mounted the file is placed in the apps temp directory at:
If the SD card is not mounted we default to internal storage at:

author: bcurtis
msg: Use the same database based upon application context for each html page loaded as part of this app.

author: bcurtis
msg: Shouldn't return error on first call.  This prevents successful invocation, which prevents deviceready from firing.
